title: Best Employee for Q1 FY2020

title: Walmart Hackathon 3.0 Winner
description: Augmented Reality (AR) based app with interactive shopping experience for customers to be used within Walmart stores.

title: Agni's Pride Award
description: Best outgoing student for the Batch of 2018

title: Student President of ECE Department
description: Student President of the Department of ECE for the Academic year 2017-18

title: Winner of Inter-college Hackathon

title: Winner of Project Display Competition (IETE)

title: Winner of Clash of Kaizeners
description: Developed and programmed a Robot that follows a black line on a white surface and came up with innovative solutions on the spot to the challenges presented during the event.
